title: My Gnosis Archival node with Erigon + Lighthouse is stuck at block 30202550
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`

v2.50.0

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX 

Linux (docker_

Commit hash: 


Erigon Command (with flags/config):

```
--chain=gnosis 
      --datadir=/home/erigon/.local/share/erigon
      --private.api.addr=0.0.0.0:9090
      --metrics --metrics.addr=0.0.0.0 --metrics.port=6060 
      --pprof --pprof.addr=0.0.0.0 --pprof.port=6061
      --authrpc.jwtsecret=/home/erigon/.local/share/erigon/jwt.hex 
      --http.addr=0.0.0.0 --http.vhosts="*" --http.corsdomain="*" 
      --ws 
      --authrpc.addr=0.0.0.0 --authrpc.vhosts="*" 
      --http.api="eth,net,web3,admin,trace,debug,db,ots,erigon"
      --log.console.verbosity=4
```  
Concensus Layer:

Lighthouse

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

```
- lighthouse
    - beacon_node
    - --disable-upnp
    - --datadir=/var/lib/lighthouse
    - --port=9000
    - --http
    - --http-address=0.0.0.0
    - --http-port=4000
    - --network=gnosis
    - --execution-endpoint=http://erigon:8551
    - --execution-jwt=/jwt.hex
    - --debug-level=info
    - --validator-monitor-auto
    - --terminal-total-difficulty-override=8626000000000000000000058750000000000000000000
    - --subscribe-all-subnets
    - --import-all-attestations
    - --metrics
    - --metrics-port=5054
    - --metrics-address=0.0.0.0
    -    
```

Chain/Network: 

Gnosis

#### Expected behaviour

Node should be synced to latest block

#### Actual behaviour

stuck at `30202550`

![image](https://github.com/ledgerwatch/erigon/assets/22043860/1dfb5c21-67ad-42b5-8991-3d2adaacd7da)


#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour

Create the docker-compose using sedge-cli (nethermind) and run the Erigon + Lighthouse node for Gnosis network!

#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````
